archimate:BusinessObject.name: Auditor Accreditor Credential
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: A Credential issued by a Governance Authority asserting that an Auditor Accreditor is authorized to issue Auditor Credentials for a particular Governance Framework. See Appendix H.
